import { Navbar, Container, Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin); const { userInfo } = userLogin return (
Photo Printing World
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Login )}
); } export default Header;
